website_summaries.verdict: The OnePlus 7 Pro's camera, performance and price make it the go-to premium Android phone of 2019.
pros: The OnePlus 7 Pro is fast, has a neat pop-up camera and its triple rear cameras take fantastic pictures -- all at $80 less than its closest Samsung and iPhone rivals
cons: OnePlus' new phone is heavy and isn't rated for water resistance
It lacks wireless charging and a headphone jack

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My last phone is iPhone 6. The biggest problem is the phone battery. I had to take a phone charger anywhere because, without wifi and phone, I can do nothing. After changing to the new phone, I can walk around without a portable charger for a whole day. Awesome!!! Also, the two sims card can handle my Chinese sims card and the American sims card. The phone did help me save space and reduce the weight of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Is it new?
customer_reviews.text: Im not positive this is a new phone. The battery was completely dead when it came and there wasnt a new taped seal on the box. Im testing to see if the batter deains quickly. Ive used it 1/2 day and its at 50 percent. I think it should be lasting longer. Besides that, it operates excellent. This may go back but i will order another of the same phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Product works for Kolbi in Costa Rica
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Phone has incredible specs: Great Storage, great read/write speed, super fast. Considering how amazing the screen is the battery goes well through the day. Special mention to the warp charge technology, charging is insanely fast. Product works for Kolbi in Costa Rica, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Coto

customer_reviews.title: It does worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not the type of person who wrote a review of each thing that I buy, but this is worth it, I just love my new camera, the case, and how fast it is! I’m very happy with my new phone, after using my IPhone 7 for 3 years ... I really want something different from Apple, the camera, fast, and graphics... This phone has what I need ! Also, It delivered in just 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: LilianaMichelle Lopez Andrade

customer_reviews.title: This model does NOT work on Verizon
customer_reviews.text: This is the GM1910 model, which is the Chinese variant. These devices are not approved to function on Verizon's network. In the U.S., you will want to buy the GM1917 model, which is the U.S./Global variant. This on should work on Verizon's network no problem.
customer_reviews.author: dudeweaver

customer_reviews.title: Still the flagship killer!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the best phone you could buy at its price point. 1440p 90hz 6.67in full screen display (no notch, raindrop, or holepunch here!), triple rear camera array, in screen fingerprint sensor (possibly the fastest available), 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage for $700? Sign me up! If you want flagship phone specs and performance without the $1000+ flagship price, the OnePlus 7 Pro is the phone for you.
customer_reviews.author: Vael

customer_reviews.title: Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Some functions don"t run as I expected - auto-rotate is closed from time to time, the speed dial working out from my logic. 250gr includes cover - not light Good battery, very fast
customer_reviews.author: Arie Segal

customer_reviews.title: A very good phone to use
customer_reviews.text: It's sleek and has very interesting specifications. I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great phone until it just died
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for 3 months and it was great until the screen went black and never came back on. The phone still works and can answer calls but the screen just died. Pretty shitty way to spend $600
customer_reviews.author: jamie levine

customer_reviews.title: Overall amazing phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great display, the battery life is great considering it charges fast, the camera is amazing for the average user, overall solid phone! I couldn't really find something not to like except people with small hands will struggle to hold this phone or under heavy usage you'll run out of battery in about 6 hours if using constantly. Still an amazing phone though!! I recommend for big handed people!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: As good as advertised, it does come from an Asian manufacturer so the writing maybe difficult to understand for prediminantly English speakers. However you get the phone, the charger, a screen protector, and a clear case. Since it is an unlocked phone you will have to download apps that are unique to your phone service. For example you will have to download a music player but no headphones are available. Other than this all features work proficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Irving Collier

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever use
customer_reviews.text: I had a dream to use a OnePlus phone..and I bought OnePlus 7 pro.its high price phone I ever used and it's the best phone I ever use..the price some higher but it's perfect for me. I'm reviewing 1 month and a week after I bought. and I love it
customer_reviews.author: AKRAM

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of my life I live in a small town and it got here 2days early and I just put my at&t Sim in and I literally started texting people in 10 seconds. The camera is amazing and idk there are a million reasons to buy this phone is totally worth it 15/10
customer_reviews.author: Ya boi zach

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: For being a new upcoming smart phone brand I was very impressed by this OnePlus phone. Very much worth the more affordable price compared to iPhone and Samsung, and I would even are it is of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but no warranty since it's China model. I like it, very fast and great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone (pre OnePlus 8, 8 Plus)
customer_reviews.text: Such a ridiculously good phone. Best Android experience out there. No bloat, no Samsung pre installed crap. It's smooth, vibrant, and beautiful. I'll forever but OnePlus after this
customer_reviews.author: george eiben

customer_reviews.title: My favorite smartphone
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the best smartphone I've ever owned no notch no hole punch all screen every app opens instantly it's missing one or two features that I wanted but honestly I don't care well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: HECARRON D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best smartphones I have ever bought. This is an excellent phone and the price cannot be beaten
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This smartphone is great! The only con: Fingerprint sensor on screen is not the best compared with "traditional" fingerprint sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Irving CISNEROS

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Great device, only issue is the front fingerprint that miss my finger too much times. But face detection works like magic
customer_reviews.author: Tomersh

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone, ships missing accessories
customer_reviews.text: Product comes out of the box and is missing the clear case that would normally come with it as well as the OP7 warp charging cables.
customer_reviews.author: Derek H.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone. Better looking than Samsung and Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Mei

customer_reviews.title: Oneplus 7 Pro GM1910
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift to my cousin and she loves it, any carrier can be used
customer_reviews.author: Janvier

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that I missed it wouldn't work with my carrier so stuck with a phone I can't use
customer_reviews.author: Sf

customer_reviews.title: OnePlus Gang On The Rise
customer_reviews.text: Best value for your buck in the cell phone world!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone except for the screen burn in 😭
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Robert Nolin

customer_reviews.title: This phone is really good and the seller is legit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best piece of technology I have ever held in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: David Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Works super fast. Has long battery life, even on 90Mhz screen. Excellent picture quality. Would really like wireless charging, and Water Proofing. It is a bit thicker than my previous Galaxy phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Johanna N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Though the box that contains the smart phone does not like the original box, the phone is Oneplus 7 Pro and it looks brand new! I like this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY, especially this phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought it from their website. Got scammed, do not buy it!!! I cannot emphasize this. Turn it on and never went past the setup screen!! It never worked, no refund and terrible customer service!!! 1 month gone, no working phone, no actual solutions. $700 down the drain. OnePlus is a terrible company building terrible products.
customer_reviews.author: gabs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone from any metric.
customer_reviews.text: Had been rather unimpressed with my Lenovo made Droids and S9 Samsung... This phone blew them all away. Best phone I've had in ages. Run my life and my business (Mercedes Restoration) on it. One plus Convert and never looked back. *would really like wireless charging and a micro SD slot if anyone is listwbing*
customer_reviews.author: jhodg5ck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this directly from the OnePlus site. My son absolutely loves it. It is so smooth and fast. It's better than his father's phone!
customer_reviews.author: Ibby Boi

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Having used Samsung note, iPhone and Google Pixel XL, one can only conclude that this is not just the best value you can get, but also the most outstanding performance for your money today. Recommended without reservations
customer_reviews.author: Eze

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Buck I've Ever Seen
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this phone from Amazon but I just wanted everyone to know how great this phone is. Every spec on it surpasses the phones released in it's generation for less money than all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone 😍
customer_reviews.text: Very fast fingerprint read, battery life lasts quite long and when you play games or watch movies, sure it drains faster but the fast charge is very quick and before you know it, your at 70-80% in no time. The value is amazing for this phone. Bought it over a year ago and this thing still performs amazing. Won't be updating until maybe the oneplus 10? Or after... Beauty! Display is amazing! Handles anything you throw at it. Any game, doesnt break at sweat.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Does not work overseas
customer_reviews.text: Purchased directly from oneplus. Worked fine in the US, however when I went to Thailand got strong signal connection BUT UNABLE TO TRANSFER DATA OR MAKE CALLS, absolutely NO HELP from oneplus. Tried local sim and fi sim both had worked in my previous phone in Thailand . Oneplus 7 pro simply won't work with sim - wifi works fine, but I bought it to be able to use both in the US and overseas! Same issue in Malaysia. So despite being dual sim it is completely useless outside the US.
customer_reviews.author: warmsea

customer_reviews.title: the best looking and most functional smartphone out there
customer_reviews.text: I moved from Apple to oneplus 7 pro, the flawless android oxygen OS integration made departing Apple an easy and great decision. The physical features of this phone are top notch, the call quality is better than iphone's, oxygen os takes care of ram management so this phone doesn't freeze like the pixel or even samsung.
customer_reviews.author: bd

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, subpar cameras
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about a year. It does everything right EXCEPT the cameras. If this were able to match the pixel or an iphone it would be a no brainer. Cameras however, are an afterthought for OnePlus.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

product_meta.title: OnePlus 7 Pro - 256GB Dual-Sim GSM Unlocked Android SmartPhone - Mirror Grey
product_meta.description: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all areas: FDD LTE: B1,2,3,4,5,7,8,12,13,17,18,19,20,25,26,28,29,32,66 TDD-LTE: B34,38,39,40,41 TDS: B34,39 UMTS: B1,2,4,5,8,9,19 CDMA: BC0,BC1 GSM: B2,3,5,8. Oneplus 7 Pro GM1910 (China Model), , Memory: 256GB+8GB, Display Size: 6.67 inches QHD+ AMOLED Display | Resolution: 1440 x 3120 pixels, Aspect Ratio: 19.5:9 | Type: AMOLED | Cover Glass: 3D Corning Gorilla, Triple Rear Camera: 48MP Main (f/1.6) + 16MP Ultra Wide Angle (f/2.2) + 8MP Telephoto (f/2.4). Dual LED Flash, Video: 4K resolution at 30/60 fps | 1080p resolution at 30/60 fps | Super Slow Motion: 1080p videos at 240 fps | 720p video at 480 fps, Time-Lapse, Video Editor. Pop-up front camera: 16MP, Video: 1080p resolution at 30 fps | Time-Lapse. This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
feature_bullets: Oneplus 7 Pro GM1910 (China Model), Display Size: 6.67", QHD+ AMOLED | Resolution: 1440 x 3120 pixels | Type: AMOLED | Cover Glass: 3D Corning Gorilla, Triple Rear Camera: 48MP Main + 16MP Ultra Wide Angle + 8MP Telephoto . Memory: 256GB+8GB, Dual LED Flash, Video: 4K resolution at 30/60 fps | 1080p resolution at 30/60 fps | Super Slow Motion: 1080p videos at 240 fps | 720p video at 480 fps, Time-Lapse, Video Editor. Pop-up front camera: 16MP.
